trans-unit.source: Implements the <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> task.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> 工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 請使用專案檔中的 <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkPath Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b7bcdd7-d4a0-442d-af29-8aadb3b10598).
trans-unit.target: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [GetFrameworkPath 工作](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b7bcdd7-d4a0-442d-af29-8aadb3b10598)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下都會傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
trans-unit.target: 所需的位置沒有執行`GetFrameworkPath`工作中，而是由工作支援只取得和設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 組件的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 版組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 組件的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 組件的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 組件的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.5 組件。

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.0 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Framework 4 版的路徑 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.5 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Framework 4.5 版的路徑 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有最新版本 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 組件的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 含有最新版本 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 組件的資料夾路徑。
